description: Experience a fascinating and immersive walking tour exploring the East India Company's historic beginnings in Tudor England. Trace the steps of English merchants who established the company in 1600 - uncovering its important role as a significant precursor to colonial rule. Visit the sites of iconic buildings and places that played a part in this journey.

factsheet.heading: About
paragraphs: Experience a fascinating and immersive walking tour exploring the East India Company's historic beginnings in Tudor England. Trace the steps of English merchants who established the company in 1600 - uncovering its important role as a significant precursor to colonial rule. Visit the sites of iconic buildings and places that played a part in this journey.

factsheet.heading: What Do I Need To Bring?
paragraphs: The walking tour is suitable for adults, teenagers and parents/guardians with children aged 7+, but all ages are welcome!
We will also provide children with activity packs and pens/pencils to complete. There are prizes for the Tudor sleuths too.

images.title: The Origins of East India Company

location.address: Golden Hinde, St Mary Overie's Dock, Cathedral Street, SE1 9DE

name: The Origins of the East India Company
